title: Do i do it right?
body: So on the main client there is a issue with the items bought with rp failing to appear but if i buy the rp on the alpha client bcz on the main client is dezactivated will it work?

replies.body:
If you're still on the **live environment** then it should. I don't see any current issues with RP purchases now, so you should be good to go.

Let me know if you have any other issues.
